title: Gotham and serif=?
content:
Greetings comrades

I have recently bought Gotham and i am trying to pair it up with a perfect serif. I am looking to buy a serif to jell with Gotham? I spent allot on Gotham and I still have money left to buy a good serif.
author: Typedog

comments.content: Did you look at any of the serif types by H&FJ? Chronicle seems nice.

Yes, H&FJ has good serif's, however I wanted to mix things up a bit.

Guerrizmo
what was it you found appealing about Gotham?
